Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.everit.json.schema.internal.IPAddressValidator
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.internal.JSONPointer
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.internal.TypeBasedMultiplexer
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.SchemaLoader.SchemaLoaderBuilder.addFormatValidator(String, FormatValidator)
    instead it is better to override FormatValidator.formatName() and use SchemaLoader.SchemaLoaderBuilder.addFormatValidator(FormatValidator)
    org.everit.json.schema.Schema.failure(Class<?>, Object)
    org.everit.json.schema.internal.URIFormatValidator.failure(String)
    use Optional.of(String.format("[%s] is not a valid URI", subject)) instead
    org.everit.json.schema.Schema.failure(String, String)
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.internal.JSONPointer.forDocument(JSONObject, String)
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.internal.JSONPointer.forURL(SchemaClient, String)
    org.everit.json.schema.ObjectSchema.getPatternProperties()
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.SchemaLoader.SchemaLoaderBuilder.getRootSchemaJson()
    org.everit.json.schema.ObjectSchema.Builder.patternProperty(Pattern, Schema)
    org.everit.json.schema.ObjectSchema.Builder.patternProperty(String, Schema)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.internal.JSONPointer(Supplier<JSONObject>, String)
    org.everit.json.schema.SchemaException(String)
    org.everit.json.schema.SchemaException(String, Class<?>, Object)
    org.everit.json.schema.SchemaException(String, List<Class<?>>, Object)
    org.everit.json.schema.SchemaException(String, Throwable)
    org.everit.json.schema.loader.StringSchemaLoader(LoadingState)
    explicitly specify the format validators with StringSchemaLoader.StringSchemaLoader(LoadingState, Map) instead
    org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException(Class<?>, Object)
    org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException(Schema, Class<?>, Object, String)
    org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException(Schema, String)
    use one of the constructors which explicitly specify the violated keyword instead
    org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException(Schema, String, List<ValidationException>)
    use one of the constructors which explicitly specify the keyword instead
    org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException(Schema, String, String)
    org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException(String)
